html:
2025-0700
2025-10-03ESDC, CEICEmployment Insurance ActRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations The Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations in order to (1) amend the end dates for the waive of the one-week waiting period for employment insurance from October 11, 2025 to April 11, 2026; (2) suspend the treatment of rules on monies paid on separation; and (3) introduce a temporary measure that will provide an additional 20 weeks of employment insurance to eligible long-tenured workers for establish claims made between June 15, 2025, and April 11, 2026.Registration: SOR/2025-0205 Publication Date: 2025-10-22
subject: Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
precis: The Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations in order to (1) amend the end dates for the waive of the one-week waiting period for employment insurance from October 11, 2025 to April 11, 2026; (2) suspend the treatment of rules on monies paid on separation; and (3) introduce a temporary measure that will provide an additional 20 weeks of employment insurance to eligible long-tenured workers for establish claims made between June 15, 2025, and April 11, 2026.
